Level 3 Transmutation Spell

Alter time around up to 6 enemies to Slow them. They won't get far, they can't do much, and they're easier to hit.

18m WIS Save Concentration

Slow is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Slow is a Lvl 3 Spell from the Transmutation school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Slow Information

Description: Alter time to Slow up to 6 enemies. They won't get far, they can't do much, and they're easier to hit. Condition (Slowed): Movement Speed is halved. Armour Class is reduced by 2. Dexterity Saving Throws is reduced by 2. Cannot take Reactions. Can only take an Action or a Bonus Action (not both). Cannot make more than one attack per turn. Spells cast might be delayed for a turn. Level: Lvl 3 spell School: Transmutation School Casting Time: Action Duration: 10 Turns Range: 18m Requires Concentration: Yes Saving Throw: WIS Save
